page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT CHURCH LAWTON
page.content:
The results of this survey are taken from a sample of 61 adults who were in full time employment. The following chart is a classification of all various forms of employment found. {JOB CLASSIFICATION SURVEY.} Job Classification Number % 1. Service Industry 24 (39%) 2. Manufacturing Industry 16 (26%) 3. Education 4 ( 7%) 4. Health 4 ( 7%) 5. Computer Technology 3 ( 5%) 6. Financial 3 ( 5%) 7. Catering 2 ( 3%) 8. Specialist Occupations 2 ( 3%) 9. Farming 2 ( 3%) 10.Local Government 1 ( 2%)
These figures show that Church Lawton is a dormitory village with people living here and travelling, in some cases, many miles to their jobs.
